mapper.sql: id, logname, userid, createtime, state, ip
mapper.select: select * from login_log order by createtime desc
mapper.insert: insert into login_log (id, logname, userid, createtime, state, ip, message) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{logname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{message,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

logname = #{logname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

message = #{message,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
